p: All animals were fed in an environmentally-controlled breeding room (temperature maintained at about 25 °C with a 12 h light/dark cycle) for at least one week before starting the experiments and fed with standard laboratory food and water ad libitum. All rats were randomly divided into seven groups of 10 rats each as follows: control group, control + raw group (CR), control + vinegar group (CV), model group (blood stasis syndrome model), model + raw group (MR), model + vinegar group (MV), model + compound Danshen tablet group (positive drug control group, MD).
